summary:
The NSA’s “National Cryptographic School Television Catalogue” from 1991 lists about 600 COMSEC and SIGINT training videos. 
There are a bunch explaining the operations of various cryptographic equipment, and a few code words I have never heard of before.
title: List of Old NSA Training Videos

summary: An old but persistent email scam known as "sextortion" has a new personalized touch: The missives, which claim that malware has captured webcam footage of recipients pleasuring themselves, now include a photo of the target's home in a bid to make threats about publishing the videos more frightening and convincing
title: Sextortion Scams Now Include Photos of Your Home

summary: Remember dismissing your less-techie friends' concerns.  Turns out they were right
title: > Yes, your phone is listening to you

summary: Last week I asked if anyone had suggestions for a MagSafe car mount and I got a ton of recommendations.  Loads of love for Peak Design but I'm not paying that much just to hold my phone.  Lots of people also suggested various no-name brand ones from Amazon which were much more palatable to me...
title: MagSafe Miscellania

summary: I think my wife is awesome and she just keeps getting better
title: My Partner

summary: Who knew Jelly Babies were referred to in Victorian times as 'Unclaimed Babies'.  Not me, until today
title: > The sinister history of Jelly Babies

summary: I am selling a couple of watches that I have not worn in a very long time.  All are in excellent condition, the Ocean Diver Chronograph is new old stock (NOS) and has never been worn.  It is in factory perfect condition
title: Watches For Sale

summary:
Three men in the United Kingdom have pleaded guilty to operating otp[. ]agency, a once popular online service that helped attackers intercept the one-time passcodes (OTPs) that many websites require as a second authentication factor in addition to passwords. 

Launched in November 2019, OTP Agency was a service for intercepting one-time passwords needed to log in to various websites...
title: Owners of 1-Time Passcode Theft Service Plead Guilty
